UserCode
Class OrangeFish

java.lang.Object
  UserCode.OrangeFish
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUpdatable
public class OrangeFish
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUpdatable

Represents an 'OrangeFish'. This is an object that can be placed in the aquarium and swim around.

Version:
0.2 - 29-01-2021
Author:
Kristopher Randle

Method Detail

CreateSoundEffects

public void CreateSoundEffects()
METHOD: Initalises and populates the List '_soundEffects' with an appropriate selection of .wav files. Any 'OrangeFish' can play any one of these 'SoundEffect's at a time.
